p.d: France and Portugal have enjoyed special bilateral relations for more than 500 years. The French diplomatic mission has operated here for 70 years, and looks after 30,000 expatriates and 2 million holidaymakers annually. It has been headed by Jean-Fran√ßois Blarel for 3 years. Directed by: Julien Bur (season 1, France, 2016)
